content.text:
# Draft:DGovernor Empire Media

----
DGovernor Empire Media
DGovernor Empire Media is a Nigerian media and entertainment company founded by [https://medium.com/@edafegovernor Governor Edafe Oghenerurie Daniel] in 2021. The company is involved in music promotion, podcast production, influencer marketing, and digital content services. It is registered in Nigeria with CAC number 8625501.
Overview
* Founded: 2021
* Founder: Governor Edafe Oghenerurie Daniel
* Headquarters: Benin City, Nigeria
* Official Website: [https://www.dgovernorempire.com.ng dgovernorempire.com.ng]
Services
DGovernor Empire Media provides:
* Music promotion and artist development
* Web design and brand strategy
* Podcast and talk show production
* SEO and social media marketing
* Talent management and monetization consulting
Notable Projects
The company has promoted multiple music releases, including:
* "Know Us" by Temmy Aza ([https://temmy-aza.fanlink.tv/Know-Us fanlink])
* "My Heart" by Forthnine ([https://forth-9.fanlink.tv/My-Heart fanlink])
DGovernor Empire Media also operates the "DGovernor Empire Podcast Studio", which features music discussions, artist interviews, and cultural commentary.
References
* [https://medium.com/@edafegovernor/dgovernor-empire-media-powers-temmy-azas-new-single-know-us-185b3db9d302 DGovernor Empire Media Powers Temmy Aza’s New Single “Know Us” – Medium]
* [https://temmy-aza.fanlink.tv/Know-Us Temmy Aza – Know Us (Fanlink)]
* [https://forth-9.fanlink.tv/My-Heart Forthnine – My Heart (Fanlink)]
